name: ZekeSkySupport
_source: speak;Zeke;I just wanted to let you know you can drop the noble speak when you're with us. We're all friends here.
speak;Sky;Noble{tgm}...{tgm} speak? I'm not quite sure what you mean.
speak;Zeke;That. Commoners don't normally talk so formally all the time. Especially in our group.
speak;Sky;I see{tgm}...{tgm} Why{tgm}...{tgm} would I want to drop my "noble speak"?
speak;Zeke;It's clunky. Too many words, they're all way too long.
speak;Zeke;You don't have to if you don't want to. I just figured you might want to let your guard down while you're away from home.
speak;Sky;I will try. Thank you, Zeke.
